price: Wọ́n wí pé: “Dájúdájú àwọn méjèèjì yìí, òpìdán ni wọ́n o. Wọ́n fẹ́ mu yín jáde kúrò lórí ilẹ̀ yín pẹ̀lú idán wọn ni. Wọ́n sì (fẹ́) gba ojú ọ̀nà yín tó dára jùlọ mọ yín lọ́wọ́.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنۡ هَٰذَٰنِ لَسَٰحِرَٰنِ يُرِيدَانِ أَن يُخۡرِجَاكُم مِّنۡ أَرۡضِكُم بِسِحۡرِهِمَا وَيَذۡهَبَا بِطَرِيقَتِكُمُ ٱلۡمُثۡلَىٰ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū in hādhāni lasāḥirāni yurīdāni an yukh'rijākum min arḍikum bisiḥ'rihimā wayadhhabā biṭarīqatikumu al-muth'lā
